pr_title: Use absolute error when a floating point column mean is close to 0

timeline.message:
Use absolute error when a floating point column mean is close to 0

Instead of requiring either the control mean or the test mean to
be exactly 0, use the absolute error rule when at least one of them
is close to 0.

timeline.bodyText: It is possible for controlResult.getRowCount() to return zero here? If not, perhaps, add a comment to explain why.
timeline.author: mbasmanova

replies.bodyText: Comment added: Row count won't be zero since otherwise controlSum and testSum will both be null, and this has already been handled above.
